FuncDef: This command configures the low watermark value for the dns-ip-cache. If the dns-ip-cache has previously crossed the high-watermark value, the system will clear the trap in case the number of IP addresses stored in the cache crosses below the low watermark value.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the low watermark value, in percent. Values-0 to 100. ParamDefault: Default- 80
